name: VendorReliance AI
description: An agentic LLM service that automatically gathers financial statements, news alerts, and compliance records for a vendor, computes a risk score, and produces a concise reliability report for procurement teams.

tools.name: fetch_financials
tools.description: Retrieves the latest audited financial statements for a given vendor from public filings or paid financial data APIs.

vendor_name.description: Exact legal name of the vendor.

year.description: Fiscal year for which financials are requested. If omitted, the most recent year is used.

tools.name: fetch_news
tools.description: Searches news sources for recent articles about the vendor and returns a list of headlines with URLs and publication dates.

vendor_name.description: Exact legal name of the vendor.

days_back.description: Number of days in the past to look for news (default 30).

tools.name: fetch_compliance
tools.description: Queries regulatory databases (e.g., sanction lists, adverse media, ESG registries) to retrieve any compliance flags for the vendor.

vendor_name.description: Exact legal name of the vendor.

tools.name: compute_risk_score
tools.description: Combines financial ratios, news sentiment, and compliance flags into a weighted risk score between 0 (low risk) and 100 (high risk).

financials.description: Financial metrics as returned by fetch_financials.

news_sentiment.description: Aggregated sentiment score from recent news (-1 to 1).

compliance_flags.description: List of compliance issues returned by fetch_compliance.

tools.name: summarize_vendor
tools.description: Creates a markdown executive summary of the vendor’s risk profile, including the score, key financial highlights, notable news, and compliance concerns.

vendor_name.description: Exact legal name of the vendor.

key_findings.description: Bullet‑point list of the most important observations.

tools.name: export_report
tools.description: Formats the markdown summary into the requested file type (PDF or HTML) and returns a secure download URL.

vendor_name.description: Exact legal name of the vendor.

summary_markdown.description: The markdown text produced by summarize_vendor.
